mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()
    rev = s[::-1]
    return s != rev

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()
    rev = s[::+1]
    return s == rev

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()
    rev = s[::-2]
    return s == rev

    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()
    rev = s[::-0]
    return s == rev

    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()
    rev = s[::--1]
    return s == rev

mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum())).lower()
    rev = s[::-1]
    return s == rev
